title: Nigerian gets 10 years for laundering millions stolen from elderly
description: A Nigerian man was sentenced on Monday to 10 years and one month in prison for conspiring to launder millions stolen from elderly victims in internet fraud schemes. [...]

title: US SEC’s X account hacked to announce fake Bitcoin ETF approval
description: The X account for the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission was hacked today to issue a fake announcement on the approval of Bitcoin ETFs on security exchanges. [...]

title: China claims it cracked Apple's AirDrop to find numbers, email addresses
description: A Chinese state-backed research institute claims to have discovered how to decrypt device logs for Apple's AirDrop feature, allowing the government to identify phone numbers or email addresses of those who shared content. [...]

title: Ransomware victims targeted by fake hack-back offers
description: Some organizations victimized by the Royal and Akira ransomware gangs have been targeted by a threat actor posing as a security researcher who promised to hack back the original attacker and delete stolen victim data. [...]

title: FTC bans data broker from selling Americans’ location data
description: Today, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) banned data broker Outlogic, formerly X-Mode Social, from selling Americans' raw location data that could be used for tracking purposes. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5034122 update released with fix for shut down bug
description: Microsoft has released the KB5034122 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2, which includes only a small number of fixes due to the holiday season. [...]

title: CISA warns agencies of fourth flaw used in Triangulation spyware attacks
description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency has added to its to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog six vulnerabilities that impact products from Adobe, Apache, D-Link, and Joomla. [...]

title: Microsoft January 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 49 flaws, 12 RCE bugs
description: Today is Microsoft's January 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for a total of 49 flaws and 12 remote code execution vulnerabilities. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5034123 update released with security and Wi-Fi fixes
description: Microsoft has released the Windows 11 KB5034123 cumulative update for versions 23H2 and 22H2 to fix a variety of issues, including a potential Wi-Fi bug that was fixed in a KIR last month. [...]

title: Hackers target Microsoft SQL servers in Mimic ransomware attacks
description: A group of financially motivated Turkish hackers targets Microsoft SQL (MSSQL) servers worldwide to encrypt the victims' files with Mimic (N3ww4v3) ransomware. [...]

title: Decryptor for Babuk ransomware variant released after hacker arrested
description: Researchers from Cisco Talos working with the Dutch police obtained a decryption tool for the Tortilla variant of Babuk ransomware and shared intelligence that led to the arrest of the ransomware's operator. [...]

title: Paraguay warns of Black Hunt ransomware attacks after Tigo Business breach
description: The Paraguay military is warning of Black Hunt ransomware attacks after Tigo Business suffered a cyberattack last week impacting cloud and hosting services in the company's business division. [...]

title: Criminal IP and Tenable Partner for Swift Vulnerability Detection
description: Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) search engine Criminal IP has established a technical partnership with Tenable. Learn more from Criminal IP about how this partnership can assist in real-time vulnerability and maliciousness scans. [...]

title: Google Search bug shows blank page in Firefox for Android
description: Users of the Firefox browser for Android have been reporting that they are seeing a blank page when trying to load the main Google Search site. [...]

title: The best Windows 11 features added in 2023
description: The year 2023 marks a significant milestone for Windows 11 with the introduction of several new features and improvements. This includes drag and drop for the taskbar, AI, and more. [...]
